Episodes.Title: Chapter One: Suzie, Do You Copy?
Episodes.Writer: Matt Duffer, Ross Duffer, Paul Dichter
Episodes.Actors: Winona Ryder, David Harbour, Finn Wolfhard
Episodes.Plot: Summer brings new jobs and budding romance. But the mood shifts when Dustin's radio picks up a Russian broadcast, and Will senses something is wrong.

Episodes.Title: Chapter Two: The Mall Rats
Episodes.Writer: Matt Duffer, Ross Duffer, Paul Dichter
Episodes.Actors: Winona Ryder, David Harbour, Finn Wolfhard
Episodes.Plot: Nancy and Jonathan follow a lead, Steve and Robin sign on to a secret mission, and Max and Eleven go shopping. A rattled Billy has troubling visions.

Episodes.Title: Chapter Three: The Case of the Missing Lifeguard
Episodes.Writer: Matt Duffer, Ross Duffer, William Bridges
Episodes.Actors: Winona Ryder, David Harbour, Finn Wolfhard
Episodes.Plot: With El and Max looking for Billy, Will declares a day without girls. Steve and Dustin go on a stakeout, and Joyce and Hopper return to Hawkins Lab.

Episodes.Title: Chapter Four: The Sauna Test
Episodes.Writer: Matt Duffer, Ross Duffer, Kate Trefry
Episodes.Actors: Winona Ryder, David Harbour, Finn Wolfhard
Episodes.Plot: A code red brings the gang back together to face a frighteningly familiar evil. Karen urges Nancy to keep digging, and Robin finds a useful map.

Episodes.Title: Chapter Five: The Flayed
Episodes.Writer: Matt Duffer, Ross Duffer, Paul Dichter
Episodes.Actors: Winona Ryder, David Harbour, Finn Wolfhard
Episodes.Plot: Strange surprises lurk inside an old farmhouse and deep beneath the Starcourt Mall. Meanwhile, the Mind Flayer is gathering strength.

Episodes.Title: Chapter Six: E Pluribus Unum
Episodes.Writer: Matt Duffer, Ross Duffer, Curtis Gwinn
Episodes.Actors: Winona Ryder, David Harbour, Finn Wolfhard
Episodes.Plot: Dr. Alexei reveals what the Russians have been building, and Eleven sees where Billy has been. Dustin and Erica stage a daring rescue.

Episodes.Title: Chapter Seven: The Bite
Episodes.Writer: Matt Duffer, Ross Duffer, Paul Dichter
Episodes.Actors: Winona Ryder, David Harbour, Finn Wolfhard
Episodes.Plot: With time running out - and an assassin close behind - Hopper's crew races back to Hawkins, where El and the kids are preparing for war.

Episodes.Title: Chapter Eight: The Battle of Starcourt
Episodes.Writer: Matt Duffer, Ross Duffer, Paul Dichter
Episodes.Actors: Winona Ryder, David Harbour, Finn Wolfhard
Episodes.Plot: Terror reigns in the food court when the Mind Flayer comes to collect. But down below, in the dark, the future of the world is at stake.
